last_episode_to_air.name: Snake Hotel
last_episode_to_air.overview: Winter's arrival drives mating pythons underground, forcing the team to navigate a network of dangerous tunnels.

name: Guardians of the Glades
overview: Florida has a snake problem, and snake hunter Dusty Crum has assembled the team to tackle it. Burmese pythons have decimated more than 90 percent of certain mammal and bird species in parts of the Everglades. Dusty has made it his life’s calling (and business) to save the Glades.

episodes.name: Land of Monsters
episodes.overview: Snakehunter Dusty Crum wages war on thousands of invasive pythons killing the Everglades, backed by his one-of-a-kind team.

episodes.name: Night Terror
episodes.overview: Rival snake hunters encroach on Dusty's hunting spot, so he and his team take a major risk by day and night hunting deep in the dangerous Sawgrass Plains.

episodes.name: Fists Full of Snakes
episodes.overview: Dusty and his team mount a hunt from a swamp buggy before racing south to the python-infested Ten Thousand Islands off the coast of southwest Florida.

episodes.name: Snakes in the Dark
episodes.overview: Dusty leads the team to an abandoned missile factory near the epicenter of the snake epidemic that could hold the biggest concentration of pythons in the Everglades.

episodes.name: Enter the Super Snake
episodes.overview: Dusty and team discover a frightening new hybrid Python species when they trek deep into the dense Python Pines to prevent the snakes from laying their eggs.

episodes.name: Stranglehold
episodes.overview: Dusty Crum and his team of snake hunters devise a plan to stop Florida’s invasive pythons from spreading north and becoming a national emergency.

episodes.name: Python Tourniquet
episodes.overview: While Dusty and the team stave off the spreading invasion by creating a “tourniquet” at the Stormwater Treatment Areas, Gary lobbies to go down south and hunt for a new record-breaking snake.

episodes.name: Bone Valley
episodes.overview: Dusty and the team must capture a giant calf-eating snake and venture into an abandoned factory to save upper Florida from invasive pythons

episodes.name: Choke Point
episodes.overview: Dusty and team trek deep into an abandoned housing development where pythons are killing off wildlife; when Dusty injures his foot on the hunt and turns back alone, he comes face to face with a monster snake.

episodes.name: Killers down South
episodes.overview: To stop pythons from establishing new breeding colonies, the team hunts in the Florida Keys, and Dusty tries to recruit the next generation of snake hunters.

episodes.name: Snake Bait
episodes.overview: To prevent the snakes from destroying southern Florida, the team targets islands off of Snake Bight Bay; Brittany plans her own hunt for the first time, but it may be more than she bargained for.

episodes.name: Fear at First Bite
episodes.overview: Dropping temperatures force Dusty and the team to change hunting strategies, but a run-in with his old rival Cowboy throws the team off the trail.

episodes.name: Snake Hotel
episodes.overview: Winter's arrival drives mating pythons underground, forcing the team to navigate a network of dangerous tunnels.
